title: Indian army says ‘drone strikes, other munitions’ crossed its borders - DAWN.COM
content:
A statement by the Indian army has said that Pakistan’s “drone strikes and other munitions” crossed its borders.

Citing one incident, today at approximately 5am, multiple “armed drones were spotted flying over Khasa Cantt, Amritsar”, it said on X.

The statement claimed that the drones were “instantly engaged”.
